de.unlixx.runpng.scene

Class CheckerboardCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
        • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.CheckerboardCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class CheckerboardCanvas
extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
    Implementation of a CheckerboardCanvas as a background for transparent images.

    • Field Detail

      • m_dSquareLen

        protected double m_dSquareLen

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckerboardCanvas

        public CheckerboardCanvas()
        Constructor for an initially sizeless CheckerboardCanvas. The squares side length will be set to 10 px.

      • CheckerboardCanvas

        public CheckerboardCanvas(double dWidth,
                          double dHeight,
                          double dSquareLen)
        Constructor for a CheckerboardCanvas with adjustable sizes.
        Parameters:
        dWidth - The initial width of the canvas.
        dHeight - The initial height of the canvas.
        dSquareLen - The squares side length.

    • Method Detail

      • redraw

        protected void redraw()
        Redraws the canvas as needed. This will automatically be called in case of a size change.
